Package it.polimi.deib.newdem.adrenaline.model.game.turn

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Turn
    A turn in a game of Adrenaline
    TurnDataSource
    A source of additional data for any Effect, Action or Interaction that may require them during a turn.
    TurnListener
    Receives and propagates notifications about events that happen during a turn
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FirstTurn
    Implements the game logic for handling a player's first turn.
    IndexOrId  
    NullTurnDataSource
    A null object to allow testing and default values.
    NullTurnDataSourceTest  
    NullTurnListener  
    OrdinaryTurn
    Implementation of the game logic for an ordinary turn
    PlayerRecordQueue  
    RoundRobin<T>
    Holds a queue of elements to be executed in order.
    ScriptedDataSource  
    TestTurnBaseImpl  
    TestTurnDataSourceImpl  
    TurnBaseImpl
    A base for all other turns.
    TurnDataSourceImpl
    An implementation of TurnDataSource This implementation allows for a player to be put on hold while other players interrupt their turn.
    WeaponIndexQueue  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PlayerRecordType  
    SheduledPaymentType  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    TurnInterruptedException
    Signals that the current turn has been interrupted abruptly for any reason
    TurnTerminatedByUserException
    Signals that the current turn has been interrupted by the user
